Title: A Nightmarish Super Transformation! Freeza's Battle Power Reaches One Million
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Plot: Piccolo is resurrected and ready to rumble, but his arrival is delayed by an encounter with a dying Namekian. Meanwhile, Vegeta prepares to throw down with Frieza, but the Saiyan prince may be badly overmatched.
